metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9381 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
FreeType before 2.6.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read inT1_Get_Private_Dict in type1/t1parse.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9381` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8+esm1').
